CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Follow up on Lead'),'Follow up on Lead','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Follow up on Opportunity'),'Follow up on Opportunity','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Follow up on Quotation'),'Follow up on Quotation','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Courtesy visit'),'Courtesy visit','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Capturing marketing intelligence'),'Capturing marketing intelligence','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Business development'),'Business development','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Complaint redressal'),'Complaint redressal','')+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Reason_for_visit__c , 'Others'),'Others','')
CustomField.label: Title
